entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
